abstract: Marek Hamšík (Slovak pronunciation: [ˈmarɛk ˑɦamʃiːk]; born 27 July 1987) is a Slovak footballer who plays as an attacking midfielder for Serie A club Napoli, which he also captains, and the Slovakia national team. He also captained Slovakia at the 2010 FIFA World Cup, its first ever major tournament as an independent nation.In 2013, Hamšík was ranked as the eighth best footballer in Europe by Bloomberg.

He also captained Slovakia at the 2010 FIFA World Cup, its first ever major tournament as an independent nation.In 2013, Hamšík was ranked as the eighth best footballer in Europe by Bloomberg.
